title: Ivern mains club!
body: So apparently noone has done this on OCE yet (that I know of), so I decided to do it myself! So add me in game (Joakes) if you'd like to be invited to a club with Ivern Mains! It's only me in there atm, so we don't even have a tag yet, but if you're interested, please send me an add in game, request an invite, and I'll invite you when I'm online! Cheers :)

replies.body: EDIT: We now have a club tag!
I guess there are fuckall Ivern mains on OCE!
